summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by removing the “Built with … caffeine.ai” footer branding from `AppLayout.tsx`. However, the diff also adds a new copyright footer and modifies project/summary metadata files that were not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new footer message (copyright / “All rights reserved”) instead of only removing the Caffeine.ai branding.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to remove the “Built with … caffeine.ai” text/link and keep spacing consistent; it did not request adding new footer content.
BuildRequest scope is a frontend UI change in `AppLayout.tsx`; it did not request updating project state or generated file summaries.
